levels.description: Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</> and becomes more likely to be attacked. For every attack taken, increases ATK by <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> (up to <@ba.vup>{max_stack_cnt}</> times), then deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all nearby enemies when the skill ends
